src:
VIDEO: Študentka skrivnostno izginila, zdaj našli njeno truplo 
Iskalna akcija se je končala žalostno.
01 Nov 2019, 11:30 by M. U.
KOH RONG – Britansko turistko Amelio Bambridge (21) so nazadnje videli na zabavi na plaži na otoku Koh Rong v Kambodži minulo sredo. Nato se je za njo izgubila vsaka sled. Sledila je velika iskalna akcija, v kateri je sodelovalo več sto vojakov, mornarjev, policistov in prostovoljcev.Zdaj pa je kamboška policija sporočila žalostno vest. Truplo Britanke so našli v morju okoli 50 kilometrov od mesta, kjer so jo nazadnje videli. Domnevajo, da se je utopila. Našli so jo v bližini meje s Tajsko po osemdnevnem intenzivnem iskanju, poroča The Daily Mail.  



Truplo so prepoznali po oblačilih in tetovaži. Amelia je sicer za potovanje varčevala dve leti in je pred nesrečnim koncem povedala, da se zabava kot še nikoli ...
text:
VIDEO: A student has mysteriously disappeared, now find her corpse
The search campaign ended sadly.
01 Nov 2019, 11:30 by M. U.
KOH RONG - British tourist Amelio Bambridge, 21, was last seen at a beach party on Koh Rong Island in Cambodia last Wednesday. Then, every trace of her was lost. A large-scale search campaign followed, involving hundreds of soldiers, sailors, police officers and volunteers. The British body was found in the sea about 50 kilometers from where it was last seen. They assume she drowned. They found her near the border with Thailand after an eight-day intensive search, The Daily Mail reported.



The corpse was identified by its clothing and tattoo. Amelia saved up two years for the trip and said before the unlucky end that she had more fun than ever ...
